publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2075 Richard Baker: Oakbank Awarded Scottish School of Year—That the Parliament congratulates Oakbank School in Aberdeen which is today celebrating being named Scottish School of the Year by the Scottish Qualifications Authority; sends its best wishes to all those staff and pupils whose efforts have resulted in this award, and recognises their dedication and commitment to helping young people, who are facing significant challenges, translate negative educational experiences into positive ones.

S2M-2075 Richard Baker: Oakbank Awarded Scottish School of Year—That the Parliament congratulates Oakbank School in Aberdeen which is today celebrating being named Scottish School of the Year by the Scottish Qualifications Authority; sends its best wishes to all those staff and pupils whose efforts have resulted in this award, and recognises their dedication and commitment to helping young people, who are facing significant challenges, translate negative educational experiences into positive ones.
S2M-2075 Oakbank Awarded Scottish School of Year (lodged on 25 November 2004) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2075 Oakbank Awarded Scottish School of Year (lodged on 25 November 2004) Maureen Macmillan*
